content: MDMCOINWe present to the world MDMCOIN a currency that must be used to buy and sell products and services.MDMCOIN was built to  enabling extremely fast transactions with the lowest market rates.Smart Contracts | NFTs | Dapps | Stake____White Paper:English https://mdmcoin.com/en/writepaper/____Wallet:MDMCOIN Wallethttps://wallet.mdmcoin.com/____Exchanges:MDMCOIN Exchange Dexhttps://exchange.mdmcoin.com/___Distribution60 % (IEO - Exchanges)20% - Reserve Blocked by (3 years)10% - Development Team5% - Distribution with the Community ____Explorer:https://explorer.mdmcoin.com/____Technical data:● Coin name: MDMCOIN.● Symbol: MDM.● Max supply: Infinity.● Circulant supply: https://explorer.mdmcoin.com● Number of decimal points: 8.● Algorithm: LPoS.Timeline:● Q4 2012:❖ Emission of  210.000.000 MDMs❖ Website launch.❖ White Paper launch.❖ Social medias.● Q1 2023:❖ Inclusion in new exchanges.● Q2 2023:❖ Inclusion in new exchanges.● Q3 2023:❖ Inclusion in new exchanges.● Q4 2023:❖ Inclusion in new exchanges.____Official Launch on 23/10/2022____Social Networks:https://mdmcoin.github.iohttps://t.me/mdmcoinnethttps://twitter.com/mdmcoin
